ui.textual

Class Textual

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.textual.Textual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Colors, UI

    public class Textual
extends java.lang.Object
implements Colors, UI
    UI - Textual Mode
    Makes an implementation of the interface UI for exhibiting the game, with colors, in a Unix shell.

    The program may also work if the shell accepts the ANSI Escape Codes.

    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira
